page.title: 13SHOPS AND SHOPPING
page.content: Besides Wedges Bakery and the shop at the Trout Farm on the Stratford Road the only other shops within our area are the shops on the Cheswick Green estate.The shops were built at the same time as the houses on the estate so that the people living here had shopping facilities within walking distance.The Cheswick Green shops include Servowarm( a shop selling central heating and showers)The Vineyard(an Off Licence)a newsagents, a hardware shop and finally a general food store. The shops are open every day except Sunday,with the exception of the newsagents which is open on Sunday morning. The people living on the Cheswick Green estate make good use of the shops for quick shopping for items they forget at the supermarket.
